entry.string: Xaraya is currently in the beta development phase
If you notice any unexpected functionality, please use our bug tracker at
Thank you for your support, and feel free to join our development or user discussions to become involved in our community.
For more information on Xaraya, please visit
P.S. Messages on this page are made out of static templates. However, they can be edited in the overridden template file for the base module; the template is located on this path:
